channel.title: About JDK6 Need a bit of help,
channel.description:
Ok heres the thing, I've just downloaded JDK 6, and fully installed it, and I try to run Pkisle client, it keeps saying,
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continue . . .
Like... What the.., I've been trying to found this for hours.. if any of you from pkisle want to help me, that would be great,
[img]http://www.smfboards.com/Themes2/default/images/warning.png[/img]Please Message Me Or Answer Me On This Thread![img]http://www.smfboards.com/Themes2/default/images/warning.png[/img]
and the tuturial that melissa T just gave, the Jdk system is already updated.. Ok, First, This is what i did went to the Jdk website. Downloaded JDK-6 Windows Offline thing Downloaded Made as my desktop Double clicked on JDK-i586 Installed as Public JRE (Java Runtime Environment) restarted computer, Clicked on Run Server
There it goes again...
[img]http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/5953/snap1zw2.png[/img] K thats where i doubled clicked it...
After that.. [img]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/7761/snap3td4.png[/img] Then when it finished loading...
[img]http://img120.imageshack.us/img120/1120/jdkgi8.png[/img] Comes with this popup, i clicked accept...
Ok now heres the part where I get a bit :confused: I'll give you a picture of what each of them says, hopefully you can help me
Heres Option 1 [img]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/5781/snap7gr2.png[/img]
Heres Option 2 [img]http://img374.imageshack.us/img374/3421/snap17mt3.png[/img]
Heres Option 3 [img]http://img251.imageshack.us/img251/4334/snap15bq6.png[/img]
Heres Option 4 [img]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/5379/snap9ju0.png[/img]
azn pker1 quote this in your sig if you want
"Shoot Me In The Head Dumb Little Pizzas Flying At My House, aaaaarrrrrggggghhhhh!"

@azn_pker1 wrote:

Just click next ?..

thats not what u do rofl, your supposed to help me by what option do i click… not just say click next…

Read full topic

item.title: About JDK6 Need a bit of help,
item.dc:creator: @azn_pker1 azn pker1
item.description:
@azn_pker1 wrote:

Ok heres the thing, I’ve just downloaded JDK 6, and fully installed it, and I try to run Pkisle client, it keeps saying,

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI
Press any key to continue . . .

Like… What the…, I’ve been trying to found this for hours…
if any of you from pkisle want to help me, that would be great,

Please Message Me Or Answer Me On This Thread!

and the tuturial that melissa T just gave, the Jdk system is already updated…
Ok, First, This is what i did
went to the Jdk website.
Downloaded JDK-6
Windows Offline thing
Downloaded
Made as my desktop
Double clicked on JDK-i586
Installed as Public JRE (Java Runtime Environment)
restarted computer,
Clicked on Run Server

There it goes again…


K thats where i doubled clicked it…

After that…

Then when it finished loading…


Comes with this popup, i clicked accept…

Ok now heres the part where I get a bit
I’ll give you a picture of what each of them says, hopefully you can help me

Heres Option 1

Heres Option 2

Heres Option 3

Heres Option 4

azn pker1 quote this in your sig if you want

“Shoot Me In The Head Dumb Little Pizzas Flying At My House,
aaaaarrrrrggggghhhhh!”

Read full topic
